data.text: @Rational_Taught @freethought202 That argument only works if you are certain that you won't get sick after the vaccine of course... If you aren't certain then it's a risk:benefit or odds game and personal choice is valid.

@1grannynannymom @freethought202 It is a hard world to live in where there is no trust. Yes, they have turned us on each other. But united we must stand, I agree. It is all manipulation. I trust my instincts and my husband. That’s about it…
@IreneMayPearce1 @freethought202 Keep your head high. You did absolutely the right thing.

@IreneMayPearce1 @freethought202 & the best we can all do 4each other is 2realise the strength we have united We must b watchful &avoid deceptions &THOSE who want us '2fight each other' as in the same people who unleashed the nightmare pushed Ukraine Vs Russia & Russia is blamed Its a distraction from jab injury

@IreneMayPearce1 @Andiesimplelife Yes there are haters but luckily I’ve found more like minded souls here than anything and made some new friends who have a heart of gold 🥰. Kudos to you for standing by your principles

@Ninjablue01 @freethought202 I always see the bigger picture, few people see the global perspective. If the day comes that they own everything, let them. They will never own me, my mind or my heart. My soul will be free.

@1grannynannymom @freethought202 Thank you, I still have some things that are meaningful to me, this is what we need to hold onto. There is a lot of loss too but I didn’t compromise. Life before this nightmare seems just a memory now. 🙏

@freethought202 @Andiesimplelife It feels like a test that never ends for us. There seems to be no way out of it. There have been haters too here, but it takes just one person like yourself to turn it all around. Thank you

@SubinthePub @BMKH00089410 @freethought202 Thank you 🙏 they can take everything else but they cannot take my principles, the love I have for my family, or my belief in sovereignty over my own body. There is a price to pay for all our choices, and it is tough but I couldn’t give in. I won’t …
